title: Tanden Engine

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the game, you will randomly be given one ability each from half of the other roles that exist in this game, rounding up, and you will be told which roles you got these abilities from. If an ability you receive is dependent on an attribute, you will also receive the attribute it is dependent on. Abilities that function identically to the one already listed on this rolecard are rerolled.
- You may multitask.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you.

desc:
Post 2154
*Within my body lies the whole of the universe. I am eternal!*
